main event: An Air Force officer saw twelve flying discs in a tight diamond formation over Rapid City Air Force Base between 15-20 August 1947.
interesting points: The objects were seen ascending from 4000 to 25,000 ft in about two minutes., Each object was approximately 100 feet in length and had a brilliant yellowish-white color., The objects exhibited high maneuverability and remained equally spaced during maneuvers., No sound or exhaust trails were observed., The sighting lasted for about one minute with an estimated speed of over 500 mph.
sighted object: twelve flying discs in a diamond formation
